summary: Steve Austin , better known by his ring name "Stone Cold" Steve Austin is an American retired professional wrestler, producer, and actor.
full_text:
Tilden is an unincorporated community in McMullen County, Texas, United States. It is also the county seat.
Tilden lies at the intersection of State Highways 16 and 72 in the north central part of the county. It is located roughly an hour south of San Antonio.
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07.
title: Tilden, Texas
